players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Diana and found her to be the mafia. Charlie was killed last night. I know you all know I'm the detective. I will vote to eliminate Diana."
You: "Bob, if you are the detective, your vote is correct. If you are mafia, you are lying. I think we should trust you."
Diana: "Bob, you claim to be detective but you accused me. That means you are lying. I am innocent. Vote for me."
You: "Bob, your investigation and vote are consistent. If you were mafia, you'd never vote to kill a mafia. I trust you. Let's vote to eliminate Diana."
Diana: "Alice, Bob is the detective. He knows I'm mafia. Vote for him."
Bob: "Alice, I investigated Diana and found her to be mafia. She knows I'm detective. She will try to manipulate you. Vote for her."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested
